BaseRuntimeÂ¶

struct asmjit::BaseRuntime
#include <runtime.h>

Base runtime.

Public Functions

ASMJIT_API BaseRuntime()

Create a BaseRuntime instance.

ASMJIT_API ~BaseRuntime()

Destroy the BaseRuntime instance.

uint32_t getStackAlignment()

Get stack alignment of target runtime.

const BaseCpu * getCpu()

Get CPU information.

Error add(void ** dst, BaseAssembler * assembler)

Allocate memory for code generated in assembler and reloc it to the target location.

This method is universal allowing any preprocessing / postprocessing with code generated by BaseAssembler or BaseCompiler. Because BaseCompiler always uses BaseAssembler it’s allowed to access only the BaseAssembler instance.

This method is always last step when using code generation. You can use it to allocate memory for JIT code, saving code to remote process or a file.

Status code, see kError.

Error release(void * p)

Release memory allocated by add.

Private Functions

BaseRuntime(const BaseRuntime & other)
